RR_verdict: The Brooks Ghost 16 marks a subtle yet positive evolution in the series—particularly beneficial for heel strikers seeking a reliable everyday shoe. We were impressed by the enhancements in cushioning and stability, and we really liked the spacious toebox and durable outsole, proving its value during our lab tests. Although there's still room for improvement on our list, we've determined that the Ghost continues to be one of the best value daily trainers on the market for yet another year.
